Description: Great location on Johnson Rd in Arlington, 3 bedrooms, 2 nice size bedrooms and one smaller room, can be used as a bedroom or an office. living room, dining room, updated kitchen and updated bathroom, laundry hook-ups in basement, full basement for storage. Back deck , out door space. off street parking in driveway, 2 cars possible 3. Electric heat. owner pays for water, sewer and trash removal. Tenants pay for Electric and cable. Tenant responsible for snow and ice removal. Good credit is required. Move in costs: First month rent, one month security deposit and one month broker fee. Available now. Small pet will be considerate.
